name: Robo Bar
description:
As a robotic bartender you take drink orders from thirsty robot customers, mix their cocktails in a quick crafting puzzle, and serve the drinks to satisfy the patrons.

Created during their second year of game design studies at Te Pūkenga (Otago Polytechnic) by Justina King, Faye Munro and Thomas Beckwith.

Mentored by Lisa Blakie and Josiah Hunt.
